name: Adalo
natural_language_description: 这是 Adalo 节点。主要用于: Consume Adalo API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: collection

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: getAll
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Retrieve many rows

collectionId.name: collectionId
collectionId.description: Open your Adalo application and click on the three buttons beside the collection name, then select API Documentation
collectionId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Collection ID | 作用: Open your Adalo application and click on the three buttons beside the collection name, then select API Documentation | 提示: You can find information about app's collections on https://app.adalo.com/apps/your-app-id/api-docs | (必填项)

rowId.name: rowId
rowId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Row ID | (必填项)

dataToSend.name: dataToSend
dataToSend.description: Whether to insert the input data this node receives in the new row
dataToSend.natural_language_description: 参数名: Data to Send | 作用: Whether to insert the input data this node receives in the new row | 默认值: defineBelow
available_options: Auto-Map Input Data to Columns (值: autoMapInputData) - Use when node input properties match destination column names
Define Below for Each Column (值: defineBelow) - Set the value for each destination column

inputsToIgnore.name: inputsToIgnore
inputsToIgnore.description: List of input properties to avoid sending, separated by commas. Leave empty to send all properties.
inputsToIgnore.natural_language_description: 参数名: Inputs to Ignore | 作用: List of input properties to avoid sending, separated by commas. Leave empty to send all properties.

fieldsUi.name: fieldsUi
fieldsUi.description: Field must be defined in the collection, otherwise it will be ignored. If field defined in the collection is not set here, it will be set to null.
fieldsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fields to Send | 作用: Field must be defined in the collection, otherwise it will be ignored. If field defined in the collection is not set here, it will be set to null. | 默认值: {}

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

requestOptions.name: requestOptions
requestOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Request Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: allowUnauthorizedCerts (值: None) - Whether to accept the response even if SSL certificate validation is not possible
proxy (值: None) - HTTP proxy to use. If authentication is required it can be defined as follow: http://username:password@myproxy:3128
timeout (值: None) - Time in ms to wait for the server to send response headers (and start the response body) before aborting the request
